Text:
Plot

Rick (Owen Wilson) and Fred (Jason Sudeikis) are best friends who have a lot in common, including the fact that they have each been married for many years. But when the two men begin to show signs of restlessness at home, their wives (Jenna Fischer, Christina Applegate) take a bold approach to revitalizing their individual marriages: granting them a "hall pass," one week of freedom to do whatever they want...no questions asked. At first, it sounds like a dream come true for Rick and Fred. But it isn't long before they discover that their expectations are out of sync with reality.

Wiki definition: 'A screener (SCR) is an advance screening of a film sent to critics, awards voters, video stores (for their manager and employees), and other film industry professionals, including producers and distributors'. Sorry, but what you've upped is NOT a screener.

Read this general definition extracted from a specialized site :

Screener

Screener normally refers to a copy made from either VHS tape or from DVD-Video disc that are sent to movie critics and censors before the movie is available to public through video rental chains. Normally refers to a very good quality bootlegged copy.
This is not a screener, compared to a dvdrip the quality is, a4/v4

Please label your uploaded video quality apropriately.

screener= DVD or VHS quality of pre release media.

AVI and/or DIVX= the media file format.

Just an FYI to avoid confusion.
